name: Abdul-Latif Khusraw
story: Abdul-Mussawir Spanta was born and raised in a small village in Afghanistan. He worked as a medic during the Soviet-Afghan War and later joined the Taliban as a combat medic. After the fall of the Taliban, he joined the insurgency against the US and NATO forces. He operates as a reconnaissance paramedic for the OPFOR, using his knowledge of the terrain and his medical skills to provide critical support to the OPFOR fighters.
